replies.body:
Hi.

So, in order for you to justify that we "took" away your animal pack, we need a proof of purchase sent to the senior staff. Otherwise, you have no evidence to prove that we took away your perks... Sorry!

Why ask for a rank upgrade? $10 or $15 is not enough for a emerald upgrade, and we don't refund with those kinds of perks.

Also, we don't refund ranks/kits/packs, sorry to say.
